mapper.select: SELECT ACM.account_id FROM alumni_circle AC left join alumni_circle_member ACM on AC.alumni_circle_id = acm.alumni_circle_id left join account b on ACM.account_id = b.account_id left join job JOB on ACM.account_id = JOB.account_id left join education EDU on ACM.account_id = EDU.account_id where AC.alumni_circle_id = #{alumniCircleId}
